content: {"locationId": "9285", "organizationId": "7554", "name": "Manna Mobile Delivery - Maple Village, Petoskey", "address1": "1695 Meadow Way ", "address2": null, "city": "Petoskey", "state": "MI", "zipCode": "49770", "country": null, "phone": "231-347-8852", "phoneExt": null, "website": "www.mannafoodproject.org", "latitude": "45.3579377", "longitude": "-84.9741437", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "This is a delivery distribution - our volunteers will bring the food directly to your door. You must be pre-registered for delivery, call 231-347-8852 to get on the schedule.   The mobile delivery service provides canned/dry foods, fresh produce, frozen meat, and dairy products. Because we deliver perishable products, you must be available to accept the delivery or make arrangements with a neighbor to accept on your behalf.
